name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Senior Java Developer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, specializing in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **Spring Framework**. Proven track record in building high-performance solutions across various sectors, adept in **PostgreSQL**, **Hibernate**, and CI/CD methodologies. Expertise extends to **Gradle** and **Liquibase** for seamless build and database management processes.

I leverage my strong skills in system architecture and software development to create secure, robust applications in alignment with industry compliance standards. My background includes integrating **AI** capabilities to enhance applications, further solidified by experience in project management using tools such as **Jira**. Committed to delivering innovative solutions through collaboration and technical excellence.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed robust, scalable applications using **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **Spring Framework**, contributing to high-quality and maintainable code.
- Designed and implemented database solutions utilizing **PostgreSQL** and **Hibernate** to support data persistence and complex queries in enterprise applications with **versioning** via **Liquibase**.
- Established CI/CD pipelines leveraging **Gradle** and automation tools to streamline the deployment process, ensuring rapid and reliable delivery of software solutions.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams using **Jira** for agile project management, enhancing team communication and project visibility.
- Integrated AI-based features into Java applications, improving functionality and user experience through innovative solutions.
- Participated in code reviews and mentoring sessions, fostering professional development and knowledge sharing among team members.
- Conducted unit, integration, and E2E testing to maintain code quality and application reliability, incorporating automated testing frameworks for continuous quality assurance.
- Advocated for and implemented best practices in software development, contributing to an improvement in overall project delivery timelines by **15%**.
- Contributed to the re-architecture of systems for improved performance, scaling to **5000+** concurrent users and ensuring application reliability during peak load times.

Utilized **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **Spring Framework** to develop enterprise-grade financial applications that enhanced transactional efficiency by **30%**.
Implemented **PostgreSQL** and **Hibernate** for robust data management, achieving **99.9%** uptime on database services through proactive scalability and optimization strategies.
Developed and maintained CI/CD pipelines using **Gradle** and integrated them with **Jira** for effective project tracking and continuous delivery of features, reducing deployment time by **50%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to architect solutions that align with business goals, particularly focused on AI-driven features for improved customer insights and experience.
Successfully integrated **Liquibase** for database version control, facilitating seamless migrations across development, staging, and production environments by managing **3** database versions simultaneously.
Led code reviews and developed best practices documentation that improved code quality and workflow efficiency within the development team.
Mentored junior developers on the effective use of **Spring Data JPA** and other related technologies, fostering a culture of knowledge sharing and continuous improvement.

• Developed scalable backend applications using **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **Spring Framework**, ensuring reliability and performance in high-traffic environments spanning **thousands** of transactions per hour.
• Leveraged **Spring Data JPA** and **Hibernate** to optimize data access, achieving a **30%** increase in query response times for **PostgreSQL** databases.
• Collaborated on CI/CD pipelines utilizing **Gradle** for automated testing and deployment, improving release times by **40%** and enabling faster feature delivery.
• Managed project documentation and task tracking through **Jira**, facilitating agile project management and ensuring timely iteration on critical features.
• Integrated AI modules to enhance system capabilities, personalizing user experiences and improving conversion rates by utilizing data-driven insights.
• Employed **Liquibase** for database version control, ensuring smooth rollbacks and deployment across multiple environments, reducing downtime to **less than 5 mins** during releases.
• Implemented comprehensive unit and integration testing strategies to maintain code quality and minimize defects, achieving a code coverage of **over 85%**.
• Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and user authentication mechanisms using OAuth 2.0, ensuring system security and adherence to compliance standards.
• Contributed to design discussions and architecture decisions, leveraging expertise in both backend and AI technologies to innovate and refine system functionality.
